text: I’m trying to add an event to a user’s timeline. I’m getting a 204 response (which is correct) but it’s not adding the event to the user’s timeline. Can anyone help with this?
Nevermind, I didn’t know about the filters - it’s showing up
It’s not showing up under Reports | Events, though - not sure why that would be
So has anyone seen the beta editor for blog posts? Thoughts?
Personally, i am not liking the forcing of users into composition mode when editing
